Package fontConfig

This package allows you to configure fonts. More...

Detailed Description

This package allows you to configure fonts.

At the moment this is pretty basic. Fonts must be located in data/fonts and must have an entry in this file to be used in-game. Available knobs to configure: * lineHeightMultiplier: represents how tall a line is in comparison to the size of the font in points. E.g. with a multiplier of .5, a size-6 font would have a line height of 3 pixels. * sizes: List of font sizes to load at the start of the program. You don't have to provide this -- fonts will be loaded during the game if a not-yet-loaded size is called for -- but it could cause a blip of slowdown.
